SeqDf¶

class mapdeduce.SeqDf(df)¶
consensus()¶

Compute the consensus sequence.

Returns:

(pd.Series)

classmethod from_fasta(path)¶

Make a SeqDf from a fasta file.

Args:

path (str): Path to fasta file.

Returns:

(SeqDf)

classmethod from_series(series)¶

Make SeqDf from a series.

Args:
series (pd.Series): Each element in series is a string. See

mapdeduce.helper.expand_sequences for more details.

Returns:

(SeqDf)

get_dummies(inplace=True)¶

Get dummy representation of the sequences.

Args:

inplace (bool)

get_dummies_at_positions(positions)¶

Return set of dummy variable names at HA positions.

Notes:

Dummy variable names are either singles (e.g. 135K), or compound (e.g. 7D|135K|265E). For compound dummy variable names return the entire compound name if any constituent SNP is in positions.

Args:

positions (iterable) containing positions.

Returns:

(set) containing dummy variable names.

groupby_amino_acid_at_site(p)¶

Lookup groups of strains that have the same amino acid at site p.

Args:

p (int): Site. Must be a column in self.df.

Returns:

(dict): Maps amino acid -> set containing strain names.

merge_duplicate_dummies(inplace=False)¶

Merge SNPs that are identical in all strains.

Args:

inplace (bool)

merge_duplicate_strains(inplace=False)¶

Replace all strains that have the same index with a single consensus strain.

Args:

inplace (bool).

Returns:

(mapdeduce.dataframes.SeqDf) if inplace=False.

remove_invariant(inplace=True)¶

Remove positions (columns) that contain only one amino acid.

Args:

inplace (bool)

shuffle_dummies(n_shuffles, c)¶

Return a DataFrame containing n shuffles of the data in column c

Args:

n_shuffles (int): Number of shuffles. c (str): Must be column in self.dummies.

Returns:

(ndarray): Shape [N, n_shuffles].

substitutions_at_site(p, min_strains=0)¶

Find substitutions that occur at site p.

Args:

p (int). Must be in self.df. min_strains (int). Minimum number of strains that must posses a

given amino acid to be included. Default=0 to include all strains.

Returns:
(dict): Maps substituion -> pd.Series containing profile of

substitution. Strains with 0 have the aa0. Strains with 1 have the aa1.

to_fasta(path)¶

Write the sequences in fasta format.

Args:

path (str): Path to write file.
